name: Space Horde (Meatball Senpai)
description:
DESCRIPTION

An arcade, 2D top-down shooter made in Godot. Survive an unending horde of space monsters, score points and climb through the leaderboards!

HOW TO PLAY:

- Use WASD or the arrow keys to rotate the ship (A and D/Left and Right) and thrust it forwads and backwards (W and D/Up and Down).

- Press the Space bar to shoot.

LEADERBOARD

- The leaderboard will show the global top 5 scores for that week.

- The leaderboard will be wiped clean every week (UTC-3).

CREDITS & ATTRIBUTIONS

- Developed by Bernardo de Vargas Shiguefuzi

- Background image by Dark Lighter Designs (CC-BY 3.0 Darklighter Designs 2017)

- SFX from https://taira-komori.jpn.org/freesounden.htm

- Online leaderboard implemented with SilentWolf (https://silentwolf.com)
